pageProps.content:
### Experience 

#### Indie Dev

Divine Star LLC - Hastings, MI

2019 to Present

- Created an indie project called Divine Star Software. 
- Created and released a game to Steam called Crystalline Bliss. 
- Created several open source libraries such as Divine Voxel Engine. 
- Worked with other companies consulting them on writing performant 3d code for the web.

#### XR Game Developer

Niantic - Contract - Remote

April 2023 to June 2023

- Contracted by Niantic to build an XR game using react three fiber for their 8th Wall Platform
- Built a custom entity component system for react three fiber and implemented multi-player.
- Worked with a team of artist and game designers to produce a final product.

#### Senior Software Engineer

Bitreel - Remote

April 2023 to June 2023

- Architected a high performance 3D React application.  
- Improved the speed greatly, stopped crashes, and brought the memory usage way down.
- Built a custom in-memory multi-threaded mesh database. 
- Engineered a multi-threaded indexDB library to handle caching and loading meshes.

#### Programming Consultant

Bitreel - Remote

November 2022 to April 2023

- Helped convert JavaScript codebase to a TypeScript codebase. 
- Helped engineer a system to load in high fidelity meshes in from a thread pool to populate a digital retail space. 
- Provided software structure planning and guidance.

#### Web Developer

Etools - Remote

Feburary 2022 to Feburary 2023

- Worked directly with their top clients to make websites and manage their data
- Built eCommerce sites for their clients.
- Developed custom solutions to resolve data issues and increase sales.

#### Web Programmer

University Marketing and Communications at Michigan Technological University - Houghton, MI

2017 to 2020

- Worked in a professional environment with graphic designers, writers, videographers, and web developers.
- Help them move from an old CMS to an XSLT/PHP based CMS called OU Campus. Developed a PHP script to export content to make the process easier.
- Built new and expand upon features for their CMS. Rebuilt their image cropping gadget and built utility gadgets for management.
- Worked to implement AA web accessibility standers compliance in each project and site.
- Constructed web pages and web apps that interacted with MySQL databases and or Google Sheets.
- Worked with groups and university departments to add features or improve their sites.

#### Media Specialist

University Marketing and Communications at Michigan Technological University - Houghton, MI

June 2017 to November 2018

- Worked with a videographer to make marketing material for Michigan Tech.
- Recorded and edited videos in the Adobe Suite.
- Used Adobe After effects and Illustrator to make basic animations and effects.
- Worked with a team of people to make a consistent image and message.
- Assisted in video archiving and storage management.

---

### Education

##### Associate in Humanities 

###### Minor in Computer Science

Michigan Technological University - Houghton, MI

2015 to 2020

- 3.6 Departmental GPA 
- 3.5 Overall GPA
- Completed a minor In Computer Science. 
- Took courses related to sound design, music, communication,and software development.
- Completed over 130 credits.
